info.name: REST-API-COLLECTION
info.description:
The Project Management Tool provides a RESTful API for managing projects and tasks. The API is accessible via the \`/api/v1\` endpoint and requires authentication using API tokens.  
  
  
Users can create an API token from their dashboard. This token must be included in the \`Authorization\` header as a Bearer token for all API requests.  
  
Authorization: Bearer {API_TOKEN} (Replace {API_TOKEN} with your actual API token) Content-Type: application/json  
  
  
Role-Based Access Control : Admin users can manage all projects and tasks, while regular users can only manage their own tasks.

response.name: CreateProject
UpdateProject
ShowProject
ListProjects
CreateTask
UpdateTask
ShowTask
ListProjectTasks
